problem_names: lemma \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_inj_on: "inj_on \<II>\<nn>\<ll> { op | op args. \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op args \<noteq> None }"
translations: lemma \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_inj_on: "inj_on \<II>\<nn>\<ll> { op | op args. \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op args \<noteq> None }"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inj_on \<II>\<nn>\<ll>
     {uu_.
      \<exists>op args.
         uu_ = op \<and> \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op args \<noteq> None}
apply (simp add: inj_on_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x.
       (\<exists>args y. \<II>\<nn>\<ll> x args = Some y) \<longrightarrow>
       (\<forall>y.
           (\<exists>args ya.
               \<II>\<nn>\<ll> y args = Some ya) \<longrightarrow>
           \<II>\<nn>\<ll> x = \<II>\<nn>\<ll> y \<longrightarrow> x = y)
proof (intro allI impI, elim exE)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y args argsa ya yb.
       \<lbrakk>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> x = \<II>\<nn>\<ll> y;
        \<II>\<nn>\<ll> x args = Some ya;
        \<II>\<nn>\<ll> y argsa = Some yb\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
fix op\<^sub>1 op\<^sub>2 args\<^sub>1 args\<^sub>2 opinl\<^sub>1 opinl\<^sub>2

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y args argsa ya yb.
       \<lbrakk>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> x = \<II>\<nn>\<ll> y;
        \<II>\<nn>\<ll> x args = Some ya;
        \<II>\<nn>\<ll> y argsa = Some yb\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
assume assms: "\<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>1 = \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>2" "\<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>1 args\<^sub>1 = Some opinl\<^sub>1" "\<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>2 args\<^sub>2 = Some opinl\<^sub>2"

proof (state)
this:
  \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>1 = \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>2
  \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>1 args\<^sub>1 = Some opinl\<^sub>1
  \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>2 args\<^sub>2 = Some opinl\<^sub>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y args argsa ya yb.
       \<lbrakk>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> x = \<II>\<nn>\<ll> y;
        \<II>\<nn>\<ll> x args = Some ya;
        \<II>\<nn>\<ll> y argsa = Some yb\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
hence "\<DD>\<ee>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> opinl\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>1" "\<DD>\<ee>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> opinl\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>2"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>1 = \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>2
  \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>1 args\<^sub>1 = Some opinl\<^sub>1
  \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op\<^sub>2 args\<^sub>2 = Some opinl\<^sub>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<DD>\<ee>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> opinl\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>1 &&&
    \<DD>\<ee>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> opinl\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>2
by (auto intro: \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_invertible)

proof (state)
this:
  \<DD>\<ee>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> opinl\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>1
  \<DD>\<ee>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> opinl\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y args argsa ya yb.
       \<lbrakk>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> x = \<II>\<nn>\<ll> y;
        \<II>\<nn>\<ll> x args = Some ya;
        \<II>\<nn>\<ll> y argsa = Some yb\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
thus "op\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>2"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<DD>\<ee>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> opinl\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>1
  \<DD>\<ee>\<II>\<nn>\<ll> opinl\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. op\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>2
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  op\<^sub>1 = op\<^sub>2

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

abbreviation \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom where
  "\<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom \<equiv> {op | op args. \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op args \<noteq> None }"
lemma "bij_betw \<II>\<nn>\<ll> \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom { \<II>\<nn>\<ll> op | op. op \<in> \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bij_betw \<II>\<nn>\<ll> \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom
     {\<II>\<nn>\<ll> op |op. op \<in> \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom}
using bij_betw_def
unfolding image_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  bij_betw ?f ?A ?B =
  (inj_on ?f ?A \<and> {y. \<exists>x\<in>?A. y = ?f x} = ?B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bij_betw \<II>\<nn>\<ll> \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom
     {\<II>\<nn>\<ll> op |op. op \<in> \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom}
using \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_inj_on

proof (prove)
using this:
  bij_betw ?f ?A ?B =
  (inj_on ?f ?A \<and> {y. \<exists>x\<in>?A. y = ?f x} = ?B)
  inj_on \<II>\<nn>\<ll> \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bij_betw \<II>\<nn>\<ll> \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom
     {\<II>\<nn>\<ll> op |op. op \<in> \<II>\<nn>\<ll>_dom}
by (auto simp add: bij_betw_def)
end
end
